title: A funerall sermon, both godlye, learned and comfortable, preached at S. Maries in Cambridge, Anno 1551. at the buriall of the reuerend doctor, and faithfull pastor of the Churche of Christe, Martin Bucer. By Matthew Parker Doctor in Diuinitie, and since, Archbishoppe of Canterburye
author: Parker, Matthew, 1504-1575.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Thomas Purfoote, and are to be sold at his shop without Newe-gate, ouer against S. Sepulchers Church,
